name: MusifyBot
description: A simple inline music bot for Telegram based on vk.com music API

TELEGRAM_BOT_API_TOKEN.description: Telegram Bot token received from the Telegram's BotFather

VK_USERNAME.description: Your vk.com account's username (mobile phone or email). This remains totally secret inside your heroku deployment

VK_PASSWORD.description: Your vk.com account's password. This remains totally secret inside your heroku deployment

VK_API_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Service token of any app on vk.com. Used for recognition of vk.com nicknames e.g. @durov. This functionality will not be available if you leave this variable empty

TELEGRAM_OWNER_CHAT_ID.description: ChatID of your account in Telegram. Bot will send you some error logs as well as captcha inquires in an unlikely case it is needed to login on vk.com. This functionality will not be available if you leave this variable empty

HAPPIDEV_API_TOKEN.description: Happi.dev API token. Used for lyrics search. This functionality will not be available if you leave this variable empty

TELEGRAM_RHASH.description: Telegram InstantView template rhash. Used for sending lyrics in InstantView form. Only useful if Happi.dev API token is provided. This functionality will not be available if you leave this variable empty

MUSIFY_SQL_DSN.description: MySQL DSN value of your own MySQL server. Used for storing some metadata. This functionality will not be available if you leave this variable empty
